text:
Welcome to the Cisco page. Depending on your specific test case scenario, you can access relevant tests on either the BGP or Resources sub-page.

Cisco - BGP

The BGP sub-page contains test cases related to the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP). Here, you can perform various tests such as: Get BGP Routing Table: Retrieve the current BGP routing table to analyze the network paths. Add/Remove BGP Configuration: Modify the BGP configuration by adding or removing settings to optimize network performance.

Cisco - Resources

The Resources sub-page provides test cases related to the Cisco device platform's resource statistics. You can access tests for: General CPU Usage: Monitor the overall CPU usage of the device to ensure efficient operation. Processes' CPU Usage: Check the CPU usage of individual processes to identify any resource-intensive tasks. Processes' Memory Usage: Analyze the memory usage of processes to manage device memory effectively. Redundancy Information: Review redundancy configurations to ensure high availability and fault tolerance. Active Alarms: View all active alarms on the device to quickly address any issues.
